Name: Frequency of \Request Payment\ compared to \Payment Handled\
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of \Request Payment\ activities followed by \Payment Handled\
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of \Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR\ preceding \Request Payment\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Request Payment' for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Request Payment\ out of all activities in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of \Request Payment\ activities with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Frequency of \Request Payment\ in each variant of the process
Percentage of processes including \Request Payment\ that also include \Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION\
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Ratio of \Request Payment\ activities over \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average number of \Request Payment\ activities per process variant
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of \Request Payment\ activities that lead to \Payment Handled\ within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of \Request Payment\ activities made per year
Percentage of \Request Payment\ activities followed by \Payment Handled\ compared to those followed by any other activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of \Request Payment\ in relation to the total number of activities in the most frequent process variant
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of \Request Payment\ activities by month to identify seasonal trends
Ratio of \Request Payment\ activities over \Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE\ to measure efficiency in processing payments
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of \Request Payment\ activities that are followed by \Payment Handled\ within a specific time frame (e.g., within 7 days)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Request Payment' for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Request Payment\ activities in processes that exceed the average performance time, to identify bottlenecks
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases
